description: 200+ retro-futuristic sprites - 1950s vision of tomorrow mixed with various styles

sprites.prompt: chrome robot with round body, antenna on head, shiny metallic finish, 1950s retro-futuristic design, straight front view facing camera
boxy chrome robot, rectangular body, rivets visible, atomic age styling, direct front-facing view
robot with glass dome head, brain visible inside, chrome body, vintage sci-fi, facing camera straight on
robot on tank treads, chrome plating, mechanical arms, retro-future design, top-down overhead view
humanoid chrome robot, art deco styling, sleek 1930s future aesthetic, straight front view
brass colored robot, vintage clockwork style, gears visible, steampunk meets retro-future, front-facing
copper robot with patina, aged retro-future aesthetic, weathered atomic age, facing camera
sleek silver robot, streamlined design, 1950s Jetsons-style futurism, direct front view
golden robot, luxurious finish, ceremonial design, art deco retro-future, straight front-facing
tin toy robot, wind-up key on back visible, vintage 1950s toy aesthetic, front view facing camera
